}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This card has an alternative model of WL-305.
Identifies in Windows as a... *<small>PCMCIA\3Com-3CRWE62092A_Wireless_LAN_PC_Card-0101-2092</small> *<small>PCMCIA\3Com-3CRWE62092A_Wireless_LAN_PC_Card-FAEB</small>
A sticker on the bottom of a v2.0 board has "Assembled in Ireland" printed on it. :"02-0261-000" and "REV 07" is silkscreened on the back of the board by the sticker.
==Pictures== ===Internal=== <center><gallery> Image:3Com_3CRWE62092A_board_top.jpg|board top, shield removed Image:3Com_3CRWE62092A_Poldhu_MAC.jpg|Poldhu MAC Image:3Com_3CRWE62092A_Intersil_BB.jpg|HFA3861B BB Image:3Com_3CRWE62092A_SRAM.jpg|SRAM Image:3Com_3CRWE62092A_RF.jpg|RF Image:3Com_3CRWE62092A_board_text.jpg|board text Image:3Com_3CRWE62092A_board_bot.jpg|board bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]] ===External=== ====Revision A==== [[File:3Com 3CRWE62092A 2 top.jpg|600px]] [[File:3Com 3CRWE62092A A bot.jpg|600px]] ====Revision C==== [[File:3Com 3CRWE62092A C top.jpg|600px]] [[File:3Com 3CRWE62092A C bot.jpg|600px]] [[Has images::external| ]]
